name: Yik Chun Ho
title: AI Research Engineer
intro: Innovative research engineer with a strong background in machine learning, audio signal processing, and software development. Seeking opportunities to apply my expertise in developing cutting-edge technologies.
about: With extensive experience in research and development roles, I have contributed to projects involving generative models, anomaly detection, and time series forecasting. I am dedicated to continuous learning and leveraging technology to address complex challenges.
